name: United States
fact: The United States is home to the world’s largest economy.

name: Canada
fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: Brazil
fact: Brazil is the largest producer of coffee in the world.

name: Germany
fact: Germany is known for having over 1,500 different types of beer.

name: India
fact: India is the world's largest democracy.

name: Japan
fact: Japan is home to more than 6,800 islands.

name: Australia
fact: Australia has more kangaroos than people.

name: South Africa
fact: South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria, Bloemfontein, and Cape Town.
